class.name: CSGSculptedCylinder3D
class.brief_description: A sculpted cylinder primitive with advanced sculpting parameters.
class.description: CSGSculptedCylinder3D is a sculpted cylinder primitive that extends CSGSculptedPrimitive3D with cylinder-specific parameters. It supports all the sculpting parameters from the base class, allowing you to create complex parametric cylinder shapes. This node allows you to create a cylinder for use with the CSG system with advanced sculpting capabilities. [b]Note:[/b] CSG nodes are intended to be used for level prototyping. Creating CSG nodes has a significant CPU cost compared to creating a [MeshInstance3D] with a [PrimitiveMesh].
